mapper.select: SELECT channel_id FROM channel WHERE rep_channel = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO channeldata ( channel_id, subscriber, views, contents, view_trend ) SELECT #{channel_id}, #{subscriber}, #{views}, #{contents}, IFNULL( (#{views} - ( SELECT views FROM ( SELECT * FROM channeldata WHERE channel_id = #{channel_id} ORDER BY channel_data_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS tmp ) ) ,0)
